# 0059: Tromsø # 0006: Aurora and airglow # 0205: EMCCD Camera, Cam ID 5 (10 Hz monochromatic, 427.8 nm) 10.34515/DATA.GND-0059-0006-0205_v01 https://www.isee.nagoya-u.ac.jp/doi/10.34515/DATA_GND-0059-0006-0205_v01.html
10 Hz EMCCD monochromatic (427.8 nm) all-sky camera data of PsA project at the Tromsø station 10 Hz 427.8 nm EMCCD ASI data at TRO
Pulsating aurora research project (PsA project) Optical observation of aurora All-sky imager data at 427.8 nm 10 Hz raw image

The official release version for scientific use, containing 10 Hz sampling raw all-sky image data v01
RAW
10.1002/essoar.10504721.1
en
2021-05-31 (version: v01)
10 Hz sampling raw all-sky image data at 427.8 nm
Rules-of-the-Road for PsA/PWING EMCCD Camera + PsA Magnetometer
The dataset includes 10 Hz sampling optical intensity data from the EMCCD camera, which are archived in the raw format data files. The data files can be accessed with various data analysis software such as SPEDAS as well as with web browsers.
69.58 19.23 Ramfjordmoen, Tromsø, Norway
Japan Society for the Promotion of Science (JSPS) https://doi.org/10.13039/501100001691 15H05747
Directory of the dataset (all versions, ERG Science Center)
Hosokawa et al. (2021), A ground-based instrument suite for integrated high-time resolution measurements of pulsating aurora with Arase, doi:10.1002/essoar.10504721.1
2021-06-10
